name: Bruce
description: Nameology series “the science of names” 5 original pieces in the series. Each piece will have 20 copies available. This is the first in the series.   I’d like you to meet Bruce… Bruce lives in the city and spends his time by the waterfront as often as possible. Bruce also tends to eat a lot of LSD, so his mornings turn into days, into nights.   As Bruce watches the waves the sunrise and sunset paint a colour shifting rainbow for Bruce and Bruce alone. While the sounds of the city melt behind him
